mapinfo.detailstext:
In the old region of Araucania, you may encounter some natural boundaries that will help you defend your base while you'll try to discover the east coast with aboundant resources. Your generous homecity has offered you an extra wood crate to help you in that mission! 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -Outlaws: Pistolero / Comanchero 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Rikikipu 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
mapinfo.loadDetailsText:
In the old region of Araucania, you may encounter some natural boundaries that will help you defend your base while you'll try to discover the east coast with aboundant resources. Your generous homecity has offered you an extra wood crate to help you in that mission! 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -Outlaws: Pistolero / Comanchero 
 
 ---------------------------------
